entry.title: Hi Tony, I used to use Dolimo jars as beer glass i...
entry.summary: Hi Tony, I used to use Dolimo jars as beer glass in Australia as they didn't have pint size glasses over there and think you could be on to something. I hope you can come punting next Saturday (23 Aug)... 12 noon, Cherwell Boathouse!
entry.content: Hi Tony, I used to use Dolimo jars as beer glass in Australia as they didn't have pint size glasses over there and think you could be on to something. I hope you can come punting next Saturday (23 Aug)... 12 noon, Cherwell Boathouse!

entry.title: This is very interesting... I agree with you Tony....
entry.summary: This is very interesting... I agree with you Tony. Matt
entry.content: This is very interesting... I agree with you Tony. Matt
